title: Looking for a dedicated Draven player Plat + season 6
body:
Hello i'm a Soraka main looking for a Draven main that has experience in Plat knows how to last hit and communicate well 

please have Skype/curse/discourd/TeamSpeak

Thanks.

replies.body: I am A Draven main but I main mid and ADC add me i Y. I have been p5.
